name: The Sensitive Project
description: Born during the 2020 quarantine, "The Sensitive Project" is a participative audiovisual experience that gives emotions a shape, helping people visualize their own feelings, as well as others'. Participants from all over the world are invited to describe how they feel. Their answers are then rendered by 3D modelers, giving these feelings a form. Constantly evolving, the project exposes a global emotionality through the interpretation and translation of the invisible into digital corporeality. Oral description: Ryan Doherty (Canada), Rendering interpretation: Jett Strauss (USA)
